meanings.definition: Transform (something) into gold through a seemingly magical process.
meanings.sent1: The wizard alchemises the ordinary rock into shiny gold.
meanings.sent2: She alchemises her baking skills into delicious treats.
meanings.sent3: The magician alchemises a simple card into a bouquet of flowers.
meanings.sent4: His creativity alchemises the blank canvas into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The potion alchemises the frog into a prince with a kiss.

meanings.definition: Transform (something) in a mysterious or impressive way.
meanings.sent1: The fog alchemises the landscape into a mystical realm.
meanings.sent2: Time alchemises memories into cherished moments.
meanings.sent3: The artist alchemises paint into captivating illusions.
meanings.sent4: Music alchemises emotions into a symphony of feelings.
meanings.sent5: The sunset alchemises the sky into a canvas of colors.
